predicate.note: Frames file for 'black out' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Fall asleep.

example.name: poor John
example.text: John blacked out before Mary could hit him more than three or four times.
example.arg: before Mary could hit him more than three or four times

example.name: misparsed passive
example.text: In this way, while the Stick itself was blacked out, we kept up to date on events.
